titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on certain men's footwear covering the ankle with coated or laminated textile fabrics.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/23/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on certain men's footwear covering the ankle with coated or laminated textile fabrics.
